properties.title: Olomore Bungalow
properties.description: Located in the heart of Olomore Housing Estate, Abeokuta, this property offers a functional and comfortable living space ideal for families or investors. It consists of a 3-bedroom bungalow and a 2-bedroom boys' quarters (BQ) suitable for rental income, guest use, or extended family accommodation.
properties.fullDescription:
Located in the heart of Olomore Housing Estate, Abeokuta, this property offers a functional and comfortable living space ideal for families or investors. It consists of a 3-bedroom bungalow and a 2-bedroom boys' quarters (BQ) suitable for rental income, guest use, or extended family accommodation. 

Property Features 

Main House (3 Bedrooms):

✅All rooms are ensuite

✅Tiled floors and decent fittings

✅Living room and dining area

✅Kitchen with cabinets

✅Compound is gated and partly interlocked.

Boys' Quarters (2 Bedrooms):

✅2 self-contained rooms

✅Can serve as guest rooms, rental space, or for family use

✅Located in a developed part of Olomore Housing Estate

✅Good access road

✅Quiet and residential environment

Don’t miss out of this straightforward buy, perfect for personal use or as a long-term investment.
amenities: Compound is gated and partly interlocked

agent.name: Sarah Johnson
agent.description: With over 10 years of experience in luxury real estate, I specialize in helping clients find their perfect premium property.

properties.title: Exquisite Bungalow
properties.description: Welcome to this beautifully designed, fully detached 3-bedroom bungalow located within the prestigious Laderin Housing Estate, one of the most secure and well-planned government estates in Abeokuta. This elegant home offers modern architecture, spacious interiors, and functional luxury—ideal for families, retirees, or investors seeking a serene yet strategic location.
properties.fullDescription: Welcome to this beautifully designed, fully detached 3-bedroom bungalow located within the prestigious Laderin Housing Estate, one of the most secure and well-planned government estates in Abeokuta. properties.title: Mega Hostel
properties.description: Here is an outstanding investment prospect with the potential for substantial returns, this exquisite hostel is strategically positioned on a sprawling four-plot estate within a sought-after student enclave. Merely two-minute drive from the renowned Federal University of Agriculture, Abeokuta (FUNAAB), it stands as an ideal opportunity for astute investors in pursuit of substantial financial gains.
